response.original_title: 立夏来尝这对橘色高糖师徒
response.overview: The apprentice loves to tease the master often, watching her worry about herself, as if she can have all of her. One is lively and active, and the other is unaware. In the blink of an eye, it is already the second Lixia that master and apprentice have spent together. Will there be sweet peach preserve next year?
response.title: Beginning of Summer
